TextView.android:text: About Manicaland College of Applied Sciences

The Midlands State University was mandated by the Ministry of Higher and Tertiary Education to spearhead the establishment of a State University in Manicaland that will offer degrees across four faculties namely Agricultural Science, Science, Natural Resources and Tourism and Engineering. The decision to appoint MSU to spearhead the establishment of the Manicaland University of Applied Sciences is a befitting honour and recognition of the academic growth, potential and more importantly its commitment to academic excellence which will, without a doubt, translate into the successful establishment of a state university in Manicaland and usher in a new era of academic excellence in the field of applied sciences and the country’s tertiary education sector as a whole. Manicaland College of Applied Sciences is located on the outskirts of Mutare . Fern Valley site,is the College’s main campus located approximately ten kilometres out of Mutare along the Vumba road
